Button

public Button(int x,

              int width,
              int height,
              java.lang.String text,
              int[] line,
              int[] fill,
              int[] click,
              boolean toggle)
The button class constructor

Parameters:
x - x position coordinate
y - y position coordinate
width - button width
height - button height
text - button text
line - button line color
fill - button fill color
click - button onclick color
toggle - whether the button is a toggle button or a standard button

Parameters:

Returns:
return true if button is pressed

Method for determining that a button is enabled

Returns:
